learning.introSubtitle: Each mission teaches one clear idea about Krakens and the ocean. Finish the cards and quiz to earn pearls.

levels.title: Meet the Friendly Kraken
levels.summary: Discover where the Kraken legend comes from and what real ocean animals might have inspired it.

cards.title: A Story from Sailors
cards.body: Long ago, sailors told stories about a giant sea creature called the Kraken. They used these stories to explain scary storms and strange things they saw in the water.

cards.title: Real Ocean Giants
cards.body: Today we know that giant squids and other large sea animals live deep in the ocean. In the dark, they can look huge and mysterious, just like a Kraken in a story.

cards.title: Legend and Science
cards.body: A legend is a story people tell again and again. Science is how we test ideas to see if they are true. The Kraken is a legend, but real animals and the deep sea are what science can study.

quiz.question: Why did sailors talk about a Kraken?
options: To explain strange things they saw in the ocean
To talk about deserts and sand

quiz.question: Which animals might have inspired the Kraken legend?
options: Giant squids and other big sea animals
Birds that fly over the sea

quiz.question: What is the difference between a legend and science?
options: A legend is a story; science tests if ideas are true
A legend is a number; science is a color
A legend is a boat; science is a fish

levels.title: Safe and Kind Oceans
levels.summary: Learn how to keep the ocean safe for animals, plants, and people.

cards.title: The Ocean is a Home
cards.body: The ocean is home to fish, whales, squids, corals, and many tiny creatures. When we take care of the water, we protect every home under the waves.

cards.title: Trouble with Trash
cards.body: When trash falls into the sea, animals can eat it by mistake or get stuck in it. This can hurt them or make it hard for them to swim and breathe.

cards.title: You Can Be a Helper
cards.body: You help the ocean when you throw trash in the bin, use less plastic, and learn more about sea life. Even small choices add up to big changes over time.

quiz.question: Why is the ocean important to animals?
options: It is their home and gives them food
It is a place to park cars
It is only for people to swim in

quiz.question: Why is trash in the ocean a problem?
options: Animals can be hurt or stuck in it
It makes the ocean taste like candy
It turns the water into clouds

quiz.question: How can you help the ocean?
options: Throw trash in the bin and use less plastic
Throw more trash in the water

videos.title: Giant Squid: Real Life Kraken
videos.description: Discover the real giant squid that inspired the Kraken legend. See how scientists found this amazing deep-sea creature.
videos.hint: Perfect after learning about the Kraken legend in Mission 1.

videos.title: The Kraken Legend Story
videos.description: Learn about the ancient stories sailors told about the giant sea monster called the Kraken.
videos.hint: Great for understanding where Kraken stories come from.

videos.title: Deep Sea Octopus Adventure
videos.description: Watch amazing octopuses in the deep ocean. These smart creatures are cousins to the animals that inspired the Kraken.
videos.hint: Learn about real ocean animals like the Kraken.

videos.title: Kraken in Stories and Movies
videos.description: See how the Kraken appears in books, movies, and games. Discover how this legend lives on today.
videos.hint: Fun way to see the Kraken in popular culture.

videos.title: Giant Squid vs Sperm Whale
videos.description: Watch the epic battle between giant squids and sperm whales in the deep dark ocean.
videos.hint: See how giant squids survive in the deep sea.

videos.title: Drawing and Creating Your Own Kraken
videos.description: Learn how to draw and create your own friendly Kraken character. Fun art activity for kids.
videos.hint: Creative fun after learning about Krakens.

videos.title: Exploring the Deep Ocean
videos.description: Join scientists as they explore the deep ocean where giant squids and other Kraken-like creatures live.
videos.hint: Perfect for curious explorers who want to see the deep sea.

videos.title: Amazing Kraken Facts for Kids
videos.description: Fun and interesting facts about the Kraken legend and the real ocean animals that inspired it.
videos.hint: Great way to learn more Kraken facts.
